item.description:
Opening night of the Salve Regina French Film Festival held in Newport RI between 22 March to 2 April 2009. All films are being shown to the public for no charge thanks to the support of the French American Cultural Exchange (FACE). I have set an RSVP limit of 15 to make sure we have enough seats in the theater given its freely available to all.

March 24 French Film Festival in Newport - Film 2 "Persepolis"
7:00 PM

March 26 French Film Festival in Newport - Film 3 "La Faute a Fidel/Blame it on Fidel"
7:00 PM

Mar 29 French Film Festival in Newport - Film 4 "Moli√®re"
2:00 PM

March 31 Film Festival in Newport - Film 5 "L'avocat de la terreur/Terror's Advocate" 6:45 PM
